page.title: 05POPULATION
page.content: WE INTERVIEWED A LADY WHO HAS LIVED IN WOOTTON ST. LAWRENCE FOR 18 MONTHS AND IS HAPPY THERE. THE HOUSE SHE LIVES IN IS OPPOSITE THE CHURCH AND WAS BUILT BY HER HUSBAND. THE AREA HAS A MIXED AGE GROUP OF PEOPLE. THE AREA IS GOOD FOR PEOPLE AGED 15 AND UNDER. SHE SHOPS IN THE TOWN BUT SOMETIMES IN THE VILLAGE. THE PEOPLE ARE VERY FRIENDLY. SHE SAID THERE ARE A LOT OF CHILDREN IN WOOTTON ST. LAWRENCE. SHE DOES NOT MIND TRAVEL. SHE TAKES THE CHILDREN TO SCHOOL IN THE CAR. THERE ARE ONLY 2 BUSES A WEEK. SHE LIKES TO GO OUT IN HER CAR. SHE DOES NOT RELY ON PUBLIC TRANSPORT. SHE WOULD NOT LIKE TO CHANGE ANYTHING ALTHOUGH WOOTTON ST. LAWRENCE IS QUITE ISOLATED AND THERE IS NOTHING TO KEEP YOU OCCUPIED IN THE EVENING.
